posts.post_content:
For Sale:  2 Hugh Duffy Cards, Jake Beckley and Joe Birmingham (Horizontal)

*Joe Birmingham (Horiz), SGC30, Sovereign 350 back.  Nice image, crease in upper right - $35 **SOLD**
*Jake Beckley, SGC30, Pied350 back.  Centered front, two creases - $50 **SOLD**
*Hugh Duffy, GAI2.5, Pied 350-460 (Fact 25).  Centered, slight corner creases at very end, slight diamond cut - $75 **SOLD**
*Hugh Duffy, BVG 3.5, SC 350-460 (Fact 30).  Great image!  Cleanest card of the lot, bright white, diamond cut, slight crease in lower left corner - $125

Email or PM, first.  Paypal "payment owed" preferred.  Prices include S & H.  Thank for looking!

Ed
